transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Tejas ji good morning Rahul baat kar raha hun India Mart office se.
Customer: Ha bhai ek second baat karta hun.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha Rahul.
Customer: Tejas ji ka kal call aaya tha 96 pe customer care pe.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To isiliye ek bar confirm karna hai ki inhone bataya na ki kuch paid services ke bare mein inko discuss karna tha.
Customer: Ha Rahul bhai bol rahe ho kya?
Executive: Ha ha Rahul baat kar raha hun aapne to aapne bhi to call kara tha na mere mere ko raat shayad.
Customer: Ha ha aapko Rahul. Thodi der me karta hun main aapko. Ek bar aap mere ko samajh ke batao na.
Executive: Ha bas nahi nahi aapse to ho gayi thi kyunki sir ne alag se kar diya tha to ek ticket open ho gaya tha. 96 pe sir ne call kar diya tha Tejas sir ne.
Customer: Ha koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: To main aapse fir 12 baje connect karta hun, theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discuss paid services.

Resolution:

- Executive confirmed a ticket was already opened.

- Executive will connect with customer at 12 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- paid services, customer care, follow up
